name: PARAFIELD FLYING CENTRE PTY LTD
about: Parafield Flying Centre Pty Ltd, located at Parafield Airport in South Australia, offers world-class aviation training in a vibrant and historic aviation environment. Established to cater to both fixed wing and rotary wing training, the centre provides a range of flight experiences, including trial instruction flights and joy flights in modern light aircraft. With a focus on producing competent and safe pilots, Parafield Flying Centre ensures students receive comprehensive training from highly experienced instructors. The centre is part of a community that has been a hub for aviation since 1927, and it continues to support the development of future pilots with its state-of-the-art facilities and dedicated staff. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced pilot, Parafield Flying Centre is committed to providing a supportive and professional learning environment.
services:
["Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL)
Private Pilot Licence (PPL)
Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL)
Conversion from RA-Aus Certificate to RPL"]
